publ: by Beijing ZEASN Information Technology Co., Ltd
name: WhaleVideo
0:
”Alexa, go home.”
”Alexa, go to settings.”
”Alexa, pause.”
skdetail:
Video Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Whale Video is a skill for all smart devices with Whale TV/Speaker OS. Whale TV has Alexa built-in and there is a remote control with Push to Talk function. Users can use the remote control to wake up Alexa and use this Whale Video skill.
Users can also use a device without a screen as the controller for this Whale Video skill, such as Echo Dot or Echo Plus. 

With Whale Video, you can quickly get to some preset menus.
Ask for example:
"Alexa, go home."
"Alexa, go to settings."

When you play a video on a device, you can do simple playback control through Whale Video, now it ONLY supports "pause", and "play".
Ask for example:
"Alexa, pause."
"Alexa, continue the video."
